thread.title: BRIEF-VF Corp Enters Into Definitive Agreement To Sell The Nautica Brand Business To Authentic Brands Group

title: BRIEF-VF Corp Enters Into Definitive Agreement To Sell The Nautica Brand Business To Authentic Brands Group

organizations.name: nautica brand business to authentic brands group
nautica brand business to authentic brands group reuters

text: March 19, 2018 / 10:57 AM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-VF Corp Enters Into Definitive Agreement To Sell The Nautica Brand Business To Authentic Brands Group Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - VF Corp: * VF CORPORATION ENTERS INTO DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO SELL THE NAUTICA® BRAND BUSINESS TO AUTHENTIC BRANDS GROUP, LLC * VF CORP - ‍TERMS OF AGREEMENT WERE NOT DISCLOSED.​ * VF CORP - ‍ENTERED INTO DEAL TO SELL NAUTICA BRAND BUSINESS TO AUTHENTIC BRANDS GROUP LLC​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
